data.text: Kar gumazir bar fofozir mamɨn akaba, a Devitɨn otarim, a Jerusalemɨn nguibamɨn ikia atrivimɨn iti:
Bar fofozir gumazir kam kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze,
E bar, overiamɨn apengan itir dughiamɨn
Gumazamiziba ovia zui ezɨ igiaba otiva men danganiba isima,
E garima, aruem anaga uaghira zuamɨra ivemara uamategha
E gari, amɨnim sautɨn amadaghan ivava anaga notɨn amadaghan vua uaghiri.
E gari, faneba bar emɨra ongarimra uaghiri, ezɨ ongarim izevir puvatɨ.
Nguazir kamɨn biziba bar zurara ghuavɨra itima e dar gara dagh nɨghnɨgha bar dar amɨra.
Bizir fomɨram otiviziba, da gɨn uam otivam.
Dughiar mabar gumazamiziba kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia gan, kar bizir igiar mam.”
Fomɨram en inazibar dughiamɨn otivizir biziba, gumazitam dagh inɨrɨghan kogham.
Kɨ fofozir gumazim, kɨ Israelian atrivim ikia, Jerusalemɨn nguibamɨn ike.

Kɨ overiamɨn apengan otivir bizibar fofozim iniasa dagh nɨghnɨsi, egh kɨ deraghvɨra dagh nɨghnɨgh dar mɨngarim gɨfoghasa. Guizbangɨra, ingangarir God e gumazamiziba en boribagh anɨngizir kam, a bar oseme.

Overiamɨn apengan otivir biziba bar, kɨ deraghavɨra dar ganigha egha kɨ kamaghɨn fo, bar guizbangɨra, gumazamiziba amir biziba bar, dar mɨngariba bar mongezɨ, e dagh fozir puvatɨgha okam nɨghnɨsi. Da mati gumazim amɨnimɨn suighasa ivegha ghua, an suighan ibura.
Bizir ikɨzɨrigha gɨvaziba, e da amɨnan iburagham.

Kɨ uabɨ kamaghɨn nɨghnɨgha ghaze, kɨ fofozir bar dafam iti, nan fofozim fomɨra Jerusalemɨn nguibamɨn atrivimɨn ikezir atrivibar fofozibagh afira. Kɨ fofozir aghuim inigha gɨvagha, nɨghnɨzir aghuir avɨribagh fo.

Kɨ nɨghnɨzir aghuim pamtemɨn a buria ingara, uaghan onganizir arazimɨn mɨngarim buria ghuava amɨra. Kɨ puram ingangarir dafam gamigha datɨrɨghɨn fogha gɨvagha ghaze, arazir nɨghnɨzir aghuim iniamim, a mati gumazim amɨnimɨn suighasa ivegha ghua an suighan ibura.
Bar guizbangɨra, gumazir fofozir avɨriba itim, a nɨghnɨzir avɨriba aterima da anebɨri.
